title: As a non-EU business acting as an online marketplace or selling goods in the UK via an online marketplace, I need to ensure my members use my online marketplace correctly, so that I can meet my obligations under the new legislation. (103723)

details.role: non-EU business acting as an online marketplace or selling goods in the UK via an online marketplace
details.goal: ensure my members use my online marketplace correctly
details.benefit: I can meet my obligations under the new legislation.
details.impact: Has serious consequences for your users and/or their customers
met_when: understands what the new anti-fraud legislation means for them and take any action necessary to comply with it.
justifications: The government is legally obliged to provide it
It's something that people can do or it's something people need to know before they can do something that's regulated by/related to government

available_translations.title: As a non-EU business acting as an online marketplace or selling goods in the UK via an online marketplace, I need to ensure my members use my online marketplace correctly, so that I can meet my obligations under the new legislation. (103723)
